name: Solitaire (itch)
description:
This game starts as a randomly shuffled deck of cards plus four gaps placed in a 4 row configuration. The goal of this game is to end with each row starting with Ace and ending in King of a single suit. A move is made by placing a card of the same suit and next rank into a gap. When all gaps are behind Kings there are no more moves to be made and you may click the redeal button to shuffle the remaining cards and place the gaps at the end of each completed row.

If you discover any issues with this game, please email me at tyler.grimes@me.com. I'll be more than happy to fix any bugs you may find with the game.
